data.comment: The match is underway at Mapfre Stadium.
Columbus will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from New England.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 5, Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Columbus's Darlington Nagbe gets in a shot on goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Luis Diaz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Columbus.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Columbus, close to New England's area.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, New England to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Columbus are in shooting range from this free kick.
Gyasi Zardes for Columbus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Gyasi Zardes (Columbus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Columbus.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a New England throw-in in Columbus's half.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
In the minute 22, Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
Armando Villarreal signals a New England throw-in in Columbus's half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In the minute 28, New England are on the attack at Mapfre Stadium, where Adam Buksa is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in Columbus.
In the minute 30, Columbus to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New England's half?
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus are coming forward and Pedro Santos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for New England in the half of Columbus.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Columbus pushes forward through Lucas Zelarrayan, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Columbus.
Armando Villarreal signals a New England throw-in in Columbus's half.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Pedro Santos for Columbus drives towards goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 39, Columbus drives forward and Josh Williams gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Gyasi Zardes for the home team is judged to be offside.
New England to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
In the minute 42, Columbus are caught offside.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for New England in the half of Columbus.
Free kick New England.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 48, Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Villarreal awards New England a goal kick.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
New England have a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Columbus just outside New England's area.
In the minute 53, Lucas Zelarrayan (Columbus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Columbus are pushing forward but Pedro Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for New England at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
At Mapfre Stadium, Columbus are penalized for being offside.
Adam Buksa of New England smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to New England.
Armando Villarreal signals a Columbus throw-in in New England's half.
In Columbus Columbus drive forward through Gyasi Zardes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 59, Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Artur.
Great play from Jonathan Mensah to set up the goal.
In the minute 60, New England push upfield but Armando Villarreal quickly pulls them for offside.
Brandon Bye is replacing Teal Bunbury for New England at Mapfre Stadium.
Lucas Zelarrayan hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Columbus for Columbus.
In the minute 62, Columbus drive forward but Luis Diaz is judged offside.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Columbus.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Columbus.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 68, Pedro Santos of Columbus gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In the minute 70, The away team have replaced Scott Caldwell with Tommy McNamara. This is the second substitution made today by Bruce Arena.
Bruce Arena (New England) is making a third substitution, with Kelyn Rowe replacing Tajon Buchanan.
In the minute 72, In Columbus, Gustavo Bou of New England is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to New England.
New England surge into the attack at Mapfre Stadium but Henry Kesslerâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 72, Armando Villarreal awards Columbus a goal kick.
New England have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Throw-in high up the field for Columbus in Columbus.
In the minute 77, Free kick for New England in their own half.
Columbus have a goal kick.
New England have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 79, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for New England close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Caleb Porter is making the team's first substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Emmanuel Boateng replacing Luis Diaz.
In the minute 81, Columbus to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Armando Villarreal awards New England a goal kick.
New England's Gustavo Bou misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
Columbus have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Justin Rennicks is replacing DeJuan Jones for New England at Mapfre Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Gyasi Zardes (Columbus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for New England in the half of Columbus.
New England's Kelyn Rowe is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Armando Villarreal signals a New England throw-in in Columbus's half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Columbus.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
New England drive upfield and Gustavo Bou gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Columbus defender.
New England drives forward and Gustavo Bou gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Gyasi Zardes for Columbus is whistled offside.
Columbus to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Throw-in for New England at Mapfre Stadium.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Armando Villarreal blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
At Mapfre Stadium, Pedro Santos has been yellow-carded for the home team.
